description: A wedding website that I built for my friends' wedding. I'm working on getting the RSVP part myself (right now it points to an external RSVP service)

Simple Cipher: a simple webapp that encrypts your text and decrypts it with the same button. The next stage is to allow user to set a secret word for deciphering, as well as adding Braille text translating fuction.
